name: Corporate Portfolio powered by ASSIST
author: Assist

sections.description:
Corporate Portfolio powered by ASSIST gives your WordPress personal blog or a corporate website power to have an elegant filterable portfolio where you can showoff your amazing work or images. This plugin uses PrettyPhoto lightbox.

You can add portfolio items from the Dashboard > Portfolio > Add New UI. And you can display this portfolio in your website’s front-end using the shortcode:

[assist-portfolio column="3" width="300px" height="300px"]
  • You can check a live demo of this portfolio on our demo page.
  • Visit our website https://assist-software.net for more products or software development services.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory, or download and install automatically through your admin panel.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Where to ask questions?

This short FAQ part of the plugin page is not the right place to answer all the questions. Please consider using the support forum of this plugin to ask your questions, and we will be more than happy to help you.
